title: Quant Researcher Learning Roadmap
description: 2-month intensive learning path to become a quantitative researcher
learningOutcomes: Master mathematical foundations for quantitative finance
Develop professional programming skills for financial analysis
Understand financial markets and instruments comprehensively
Build portfolio optimization and risk management systems

finalProject.title: Comprehensive Quantitative Finance Platform
finalProject.description: Integrate all weekly projects into a unified quantitative finance analysis platform
expectedDeliverables: Portfolio optimization and risk management system

weeks.title: Week 1: Foundation - Mathematics & Statistics
materials: Mean, median, mode, variance, standard deviation

dailyTasks.title: Python Environment Setup & Basic Probability
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Setup Python environment (Anaconda/Miniconda), install required libraries (numpy, pandas, matplotlib), and study basic probability concepts
specificActivities: Install Python environment and IDE setup
dailyTasks.miniProject: Create a simple probability calculator for basic events
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Working Python environment + probability calculator script

dailyTasks.title: Random Variables & Probability Distributions
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Deep dive into random variables, discrete and continuous distributions, and their properties
specificActivities: Practice with normal, binomial, and uniform distributions
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Interactive plots of different probability distributions

dailyTasks.title: Descriptive Statistics Implementation
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Implement and understand descriptive statistics using Python libraries and from scratch
specificActivities: Calculate mean, median, mode manually and with libraries
dailyTasks.miniProject: Statistical analysis dashboard for any dataset
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Comprehensive statistical analysis tool with visualizations

dailyTasks.title: Statistical Functions From Scratch
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Implement fundamental statistical functions without using built-in libraries to understand the mathematics
dailyTasks.miniProject: Custom statistical library with core functions
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Personal statistical functions library with documentation

dailyTasks.title: Probability Problem Solving
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Apply probability concepts to solve real-world problems and financial scenarios
specificActivities: Apply Bayes' theorem to financial scenarios
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Monte Carlo simulation tool for financial scenarios

dailyTasks.title: Central Limit Theorem Applications
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Understand and demonstrate Central Limit Theorem with practical examples
dailyTasks.miniProject: CLT demonstration tool with financial market data
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Interactive CLT visualization with real market data

dailyTasks.title: Week Review & Integration
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Review all concepts learned, integrate knowledge, and prepare comprehensive weekly project
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Complete statistical analysis framework

project.title: Comprehensive Statistical Analysis Framework
project.description: Create a complete Python program that combines all learned concepts into a unified statistical analysis toolkit

books: Introduction to Probability by Blitzstein & Hwang

weeks.title: Week 2: Linear Algebra & Calculus for Finance

dailyTasks.title: Matrix Operations with NumPy
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Master matrix operations essential for financial calculations and portfolio management
dailyTasks.miniProject: Matrix operations library for financial calculations
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Custom matrix calculator with financial applications

dailyTasks.title: Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors Analysis
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Understand eigenvalues and eigenvectors and their applications in finance
dailyTasks.miniProject: PCA tool for financial data dimensionality reduction
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: PCA analysis tool with financial data visualization

dailyTasks.title: Calculus Fundamentals Review
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Review and apply calculus concepts essential for financial optimization
specificActivities: Apply to rate of change problems
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Interactive calculus tool with financial examples

dailyTasks.title: Optimization Problem Solving
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Apply optimization techniques to solve financial problems
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Generic optimization tool with financial use cases

dailyTasks.title: Portfolio Optimization Mathematics
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Deep dive into the mathematical foundations of portfolio optimization
dailyTasks.miniProject: Basic portfolio optimizer with mathematical foundations
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Portfolio optimization engine with detailed math

dailyTasks.title: Linear Algebra in Finance Applications
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Apply linear algebra concepts to real financial scenarios
specificActivities: Apply linear algebra to risk modeling
Implement factor models using linear algebra
dailyTasks.miniProject: Financial modeling framework using linear algebra
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Comprehensive financial modeling toolkit

dailyTasks.title: Integration and Weekly Project
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Integrate all concepts into comprehensive portfolio optimization system
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Professional portfolio optimization system

project.title: Advanced Portfolio Optimization Calculator
project.description: Build a sophisticated portfolio optimization system using linear algebra and calculus
project.expectedOutput: Professional portfolio optimization and risk management system

books: Linear Algebra and Its Applications by Strang

weeks.title: Week 3: Programming for Finance
objectives: Master Python for financial data analysis

dailyTasks.title: Advanced Python Concepts for Finance
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Master advanced Python programming concepts essential for financial analysis
specificActivities: Implement design patterns for financial applications
dailyTasks.miniProject: Financial data class library with OOP principles
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Reusable financial data management classes

dailyTasks.title: Pandas for Financial Data Mastery
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Master pandas library for comprehensive financial data manipulation
specificActivities: Merge and join operations for multi-asset data
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Comprehensive pandas-based financial data processor

dailyTasks.title: Financial Data APIs Integration
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Learn to download and integrate financial data from multiple sources
specificActivities: Handle API rate limits and errors
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Unified financial data API client

dailyTasks.title: Data Cleaning and Preprocessing
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Master data quality assurance and preprocessing techniques
specificActivities: Handle missing data in financial time series
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Automated data cleaning and validation pipeline

dailyTasks.title: Financial Data Visualization
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Create comprehensive visualization tools for financial data analysis
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Professional financial charting toolkit

dailyTasks.title: Time Series Data Handling
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Master time series data structures and operations for financial analysis
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Robust time series handling framework

dailyTasks.title: Complete Data Pipeline Construction
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Build end-to-end financial data pipeline integrating all components
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Production-ready financial data processing system

project.title: Enterprise Financial Data Analysis Pipeline
project.description: Create a comprehensive financial data analysis pipeline with real market data integration
project.expectedOutput: Production-ready financial data processing and analysis system

dailyTasks.title: Stock Market Fundamentals Deep Dive
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Comprehensive study of stock market structure, mechanics, and analysis
specificActivities: Learn market microstructure and order types
Understand market participants and their roles
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Interactive stock market overview tool with real-time data

dailyTasks.title: Fixed Income Securities Analysis
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Master bonds and fixed income instruments analysis
specificActivities: Learn bond pricing and yield calculations
Study credit risk and rating systems
Analyze yield curves and term structure
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Comprehensive bond valuation and analysis system

dailyTasks.title: Derivatives Fundamentals
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Introduction to derivatives instruments and basic pricing models
specificActivities: Learn options basics and payoff diagrams
Analyze options Greeks and risk management
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Interactive options pricing and Greeks calculator

dailyTasks.title: Risk and Return Analysis
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Comprehensive study of risk-return relationships and calculations
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Professional risk assessment and measurement tool

dailyTasks.title: Portfolio Theory Foundations
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Introduction to modern portfolio theory and optimization
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Simple portfolio optimizer with efficient frontier

dailyTasks.title: Multi-Asset Market Analysis
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Comprehensive analysis of different asset classes and their interactions
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Comprehensive asset class comparison and analysis tool

dailyTasks.title: Market Analysis Integration
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Integrate all concepts into comprehensive market analysis system
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Professional market analysis and monitoring system

project.title: Professional Market Analysis Platform
project.description: Build a comprehensive market analysis tool covering all major asset classes
project.expectedOutput: Enterprise-grade market analysis and portfolio management platform

books: Options, Futures, and Other Derivatives by Hull

dailyTasks.title: Time Series Fundamentals and Visualization
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Master time series analysis concepts and professional visualization techniques
specificActivities: Learn time series components (trend, seasonality, noise)
dailyTasks.miniProject: Time series analysis and visualization toolkit
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Professional time series plotting and analysis library

dailyTasks.title: Moving Averages and Smoothing Techniques
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Implement various smoothing techniques for time series analysis
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Comprehensive time series smoothing toolkit

dailyTasks.title: Trend and Seasonality Analysis
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Advanced techniques for identifying and modeling trends and seasonal patterns
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Automated trend and seasonality analysis tool

dailyTasks.title: ARIMA Model Implementation
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Master ARIMA models for time series forecasting
specificActivities: Understand AR, MA, and ARIMA processes
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Professional ARIMA forecasting system with model selection

dailyTasks.title: Advanced Forecasting Techniques
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Implement multiple forecasting methods and compare their performance
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Comprehensive forecasting framework with performance evaluation

dailyTasks.title: Volatility Modeling
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Master volatility modeling techniques for financial risk management
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Professional volatility analysis and forecasting tool

dailyTasks.title: Complete Forecasting System Integration
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Integrate all components into comprehensive forecasting platform
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Professional time series forecasting and analysis system

project.title: Advanced Financial Forecasting Platform
project.description: Create a comprehensive stock price and financial time series forecasting system
project.expectedOutput: Professional-grade financial forecasting and time series analysis platform

dailyTasks.title: Modern Portfolio Theory Deep Dive
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Master the mathematical foundations of Modern Portfolio Theory
dailyTasks.miniProject: MPT implementation with efficient frontier visualization
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Professional MPT calculator with mathematical documentation

dailyTasks.title: CAPM Model Implementation
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Implement and understand the Capital Asset Pricing Model
specificActivities: Calculate beta and market risk premium
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Professional CAPM implementation with visualization

dailyTasks.title: Advanced Portfolio Optimization
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Implement advanced portfolio optimization techniques using Python
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Professional portfolio optimizer with multiple objectives

dailyTasks.title: Risk Metrics and Measurement
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Implement comprehensive risk measurement and analysis tools
specificActivities: Calculate Sharpe, Sortino, and Calmar ratios
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Professional risk analysis and reporting tool

dailyTasks.title: Value at Risk (VaR) Models
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Implement multiple VaR models and stress testing frameworks
dailyTasks.miniProject: Multi-model VaR and stress testing system
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Professional VaR calculation and stress testing platform

dailyTasks.title: Portfolio Strategy Backtesting
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Create comprehensive backtesting framework for portfolio strategies
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Enterprise-grade portfolio backtesting system

dailyTasks.title: Risk Management Framework Integration
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Integrate all components into comprehensive risk management system
dailyTasks.miniProject: Complete portfolio and risk management platform
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Professional portfolio and risk management system

project.title: Enterprise Portfolio Optimization and Risk Management System
project.description: Build a comprehensive portfolio optimization and risk management platform
project.expectedOutput: Professional-grade portfolio and risk management platform

dailyTasks.title: Algorithmic Trading Fundamentals
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Master the fundamentals of algorithmic trading and strategy development
specificActivities: Learn algorithmic trading concepts and architecture
Understand market microstructure for algo trading
Study order management and execution algorithms
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Foundation trading system architecture with documentation

dailyTasks.title: Mean Reversion Strategy Development
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Implement and optimize mean reversion trading strategies
specificActivities: Learn mean reversion theory and statistical tests
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Professional mean reversion trading strategies with optimization

dailyTasks.title: Momentum Strategy Implementation
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Develop and test momentum-based trading strategies
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Professional momentum trading system with multiple strategies

dailyTasks.title: Pairs Trading Strategy
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Implement sophisticated pairs trading and statistical arbitrage strategies
specificActivities: Learn pairs trading theory and cointegration
Develop risk management for pairs trading
dailyTasks.miniProject: Pairs trading and statistical arbitrage system
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Professional pairs trading platform with automated pair selection

dailyTasks.title: Advanced Backtesting Framework
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Build comprehensive backtesting system for trading strategies
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Enterprise-grade backtesting system with detailed analytics

dailyTasks.title: Strategy Performance Analysis
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Develop comprehensive strategy performance evaluation and optimization tools
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Professional strategy evaluation and comparison platform

dailyTasks.title: Multi-Strategy Trading System
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Integrate all components into comprehensive multi-strategy trading platform
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Professional multi-strategy algorithmic trading system

project.title: Professional Multi-Strategy Algorithmic Trading Platform
project.description: Develop and backtest a comprehensive multi-strategy trading system
deliverables: Risk management and position sizing system
project.expectedOutput: Enterprise-grade algorithmic trading platform with multiple strategies

dailyTasks.title: Quantitative Research Methodology
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Master the fundamentals of quantitative research design and methodology
specificActivities: Study research ethics and best practices
Learn about data sources and quality
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Comprehensive research methodology documentation and tools

dailyTasks.title: Factor Model Development
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Implement and analyze multi-factor models for asset pricing
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Professional factor modeling system with attribution analysis

dailyTasks.title: Academic Paper Analysis and Review
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Analyze and critically evaluate quantitative finance academic papers
specificActivities: Review seminal papers in quantitative finance
dailyTasks.miniProject: Academic paper analysis and replication study
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Critical analysis report with replication attempts

dailyTasks.title: Research Project Design and Planning
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Design and plan a comprehensive quantitative finance research project
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Professional research proposal with detailed methodology

dailyTasks.title: Advanced Data Analysis for Research
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Implement advanced data analysis techniques for quantitative research
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Professional research analysis toolkit with ML integration

dailyTasks.title: Research Presentation and Communication
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Develop skills for presenting and communicating research findings
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Professional research presentation with comprehensive report

dailyTasks.title: Final Research Project Completion
dailyTasks.detailedTask: Complete comprehensive quantitative finance research project
dailyTasks.expectedOutput: Professional research project with full documentation

project.title: Comprehensive Quantitative Finance Research Project
project.description: Complete a professional mini research project on a quantitative finance topic
deliverables: Complete data analysis and statistical testing
project.expectedOutput: Professional quantitative finance research project suitable for academic or industry presentation
